award_title: CAREER: CAS: Modulating Ligand-based C-H and N-H Bond Strengths for Sustainable Synthesis and Catalysis
subject: One less "can you share your computational setup?" email
body:
Dr. Prokopchuk,

Methods sections never include enough detail. Then you're fielding emails asking for input files, parameters, or scripts.

Ouro turns computational workflows into reusable endpoints others can actually run. Consolidates all the sharing you're already doing into one place.

Happy to show you a quick demo after the holidays.

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
